page.title: 16Ridgeway Hospital,Belper(2)
page.content: In{Cedar Ward}there are 15 residents sharing three flats. There are doors dividing the diningroom and a big room and these are opened when they have discos to make one enormous room. At the end is a bar, and an organ which is used every Sunday for a service. There is no carpet on the floor as a fire precaution and there are fire- proof blankets on the beds.If parents go away for a week their children come here for a holiday. The{Amber Wards}are for men who can do things for themselves and the nurses are preparing them for when they go home. They have their own bedroom and wash their own clothes. The people on{Belmont Ward}may be any age but they act as if they are one or two years old and need extra care, because they are unable to do anything for themselves.
